snippet: Secretary of State John Kerry will tell Beijing that its island-building campaign threatens relations with the United States, State Department officials said.
abstract: State Dept officials say Sec of State John Kerry will issue warning to China during his visit to country about its island-building campaign in South China Sea, which is raising tensions in region.

byline.contributor: Chris Buckley contributed reporting from Hong Kong. Yufang Huang contributed research.

lead_paragraph: Secretary of State John Kerry will tell Beijing that its island-building campaign threatens relations with the United States, State Department officials said.

headline.main: Kerry Expected to Bring Up China’s Sea Claims During Visit
headline.print_headline: Kerry Is Expected to Confront China Over Its Sea Claims During a Weekend Visit
